sections.heading: lanes; driving livestock on adjacent highway; penalty
sections.text: Any person who shall drive or assist in driving any cattle or livestock over a public road where such lane or driveway has been established as provided in section 39-1808 shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1957, c. 155, art. V,

39-1810.Livestock lanes; driving livestock on adjacent highway; penalty.

Any person who shall drive or assist in driving any cattle or livestock over a public road where such lane or driveway has been established as provided in section 39-1808 shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1957, c. 155, art. V, ยง 10, p. 554;Laws 1977, LB 40, ยง 217.
